messages.subject: Why we should throw off more list members
messages.msgSnippet: Remember Claire? I ve been getting spam every week or so. Apparently that s why she joined the list, to phish by hand perhaps the almost 3000 email addys of
messages.messageBody:
"Remember Claire? I've been getting spam every week or so. Apparently
that's why she joined the list, to phish by hand perhaps the almost
3000 email addys of the members. That's so fishy. "


I'm so sorry, folks. We should have booted her as soon as we saw her
site, but thought maybe, just maybe, she actually wants to learn.

If you are getting spam from Claire Marketos, I don't know if there's
a way to make that cease without going to her site. AH yes, you
can. The e-mails say "If you do not wish to receive information
reply to this email with unsubscribe in the subject line"


I'm not receiving any. I'm not surprised. She came on like a borg
advance scout, totally ignoring questions like "Are you unschooling?"
from moderators.

Her site is very much NOT about unschooling, nor helpful to unschoolers.

I eventually banned her from the list, but not before she pulled some
e-mails. I'm sorry.


Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
